{{Content bundle |rationale=This content bundle contains Property articles, which are used by the Automatic Semantic Forms extension. This content bundle is optional. The Automatic Semantic Forms extension also works without it.}} {{Part of bundle|value=Automaticsemanticforms}} [[Vendor::Ontoprise| ]][[Ontology version::110| ]][[Installation dir::extensions/AutomaticSemanticForms| ]][[Dependency::smwhalo;152;153| ]] [[Dependency::semanticforms;208;208| ]] [[Dependency::Smwplus; 153; 153| ]] [[License::GPL v2| ]] [[Dependency::Smwplussandbox; 100; 100| ]] [[License::GPL v2| ]] ;This content bundle contains Property articles, which are used by the Automatic Semantic Forms extension. This content bundle is optional. The Automatic Semantic Forms extension also works without it. ;How to use The Properties, which are included in this content bundle can be used to annotate Properties and Categories in order to control automatic Semantic Forms creation. ;Sandbox We have created the [[ASF sandbox|sandbox article]] in this Wiki, which demonstartes some Features of the Automatic Semantic Forms extension. ;User manual More information about the Automatic Semantic Forms extension and how to use it can be found in our [[[http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Help:Automatic_Semantic_Forms_extension|SMWForum|SMWForum]]]. ;This bundle contains these articles {{#ask:[[Part of bundle::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] |?=Link |?Rationale |link=subject |default=''none'' |mainlabel=- }} {{Content hash|value=asf-xx}}
[[Category:Content bundle|Content_bundle]]

Welcome to the
Aitpmatic Semantic Forms sandbox!
Below you can play around with the Automatic Semantic Forms extension. This is easy and works like follows: #Enter an article name in the input field. Use the name of an article that does not yet exist. #Choose one of the categories in the dropdown box. #Hit the 'Try out' button.

|{{#ifeq:{{#isExtensionInstalled:automaticsemanticforms}} |true |Article name: {{#asfforminput:both|40|20|ASF Example||all|  Category:|Try out!|true}}|'''First, you have to install the Automatic Semantic Forms extension.'''}}{{#ifeq:{{#ask:[[:Category:Task]]|link=none}}|Category:Task|
Hint: Choose the category 'Phone call' as a first example!<(i><(small>|}} [[Rationale::This is the sandbox article for the Automatic Semantic Forms extension.| ]]{{Content hash|value=|}}{{Part of bundle|value=Automaticsemanticforms}}
